channel.title: Two Questions

item.title: Two Questions
item.dc:creator: @storyland storyland
item.description:
@storyland wrote:

First question: I am trying to add an NPC. I added the ints, models, and I put it into the sources npc.cfg file. But when I spawn it, it is a completely different NPC. Here are my ints.

if(i == 5004) { // NPC ID aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Heal"; class5.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; // Number of models the NPC uses class5.anIntArray94[0] = 31101; // class5.aString65 = "Unicorn stallion"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 70; //combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "A Unicorn stallion".getBytes(); // NPC description }

Second question: I am adding an item, but when I spawn it, the model in the inventory is not there. But if I drop it, you can see the item. And also, how do you make an item non-equiptable? Here is my itemâ€™s ints.

if(i == 11001) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Summon";//New option class8.anInt174 = 30811; // class8.anInt179 = 30811; class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable //class8.anInt181 = 1600; //zoom increase will make it smaller //class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you //class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle //class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right //class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 0; //class8.anInt165 = 14064;//male wearing //class8.anInt200 = 14064;//female wearing //class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown //class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves //class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aString170 = "Unicorn stallion pouch";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A pouch that will summon a Unicorn stallion".getBytes();//examin info }

Your help is appreciated.

Read full topic
